article.contentHtml:
/*

* 소스 작동 사진을 첨부해주세요 (최소 1장 이상)

* 작동이 확인되는 사진이 첨부되지 않으면 해당 공유글은 삭제처리 됩니다.

*/

​

​

​

​

​

​

​

​

​

​

const scriptName = "가르치기";

​

const FS=FileStream;

const StockMSG=new MSG;

java.lang.Thread.sleep(10);

//혹시나 충돌날까 무서운나머지 넣어버린 쓰레드 슬립(?)

if(FS.read('sdcard/PROFILE/MSG/Data.json')!=null)

StockMSG.learn=JSON.parse(FS.read('sdcard/PROFILE/MSG/Data.json'));

const u200d='\u200d'.repeat(501);

var before = {};

var bs ={};

var abs ={};

function response(room, msg, sender, isGroupChat, replier, imageDB, packageName) {

var day=new Date;

if(StockMSG.learn[room]===undefined)StockMSG.learn[room]={};

if(bs[room]===undefined)bs[room]={};

for(let i in StockMSG.learn[room]){

if(msg==i){

var text=StockMSG.learn[room][i].say;

while(text.includes('#RN')){

var num=text.split('#RN')[1].split('#')[0];

text=text.replace(/#RN[^#]+#/,Math.floor(Math.random()*num)+1);

}

text=text.replace(/#시24#/g,day.getHours());

text=text.replace(/#시12#/g,(day.getHours()-12<0?'오전 '+day.getHours():'오후 '+(day.getHours()-12)));

text=text.replace(/#분#/g,day.getMinutes());

text=text.replace(/#초#/g,day.getSeconds());

text=text.replace(/#전내용#/g,(before[room]===undefined?'전내용없음':before[room]));

while(text.includes('#전체변수|')){

var a=text.split('#전체변수|')[1].split('#')[0];

if(a.includes('|')){a=a.split('|');}else a=[a];

if(a.length==1){

text=text.replace(/#전체변수[^#]+#/,(abs[a[0]]===undefined?'지정된값없음(0또는""상태)':abs[a[0]]));

}else if(a.length==2){

abs[a[0]]=Number(a[1]);

text=text.replace(/#전체변수[^#]+#/,'');

}else if(a.length==3){

if(a[1]=='더하기'){

if(abs[a[0]]===undefined)abs[a[0]]='';

abs[a[0]]=Number(abs[a[0]])+Number(a[2]);

}

if(a[1]=='빼기'){

if(isNaN(Number(a[2]))){

if(abs[a[0]]===undefined)abs[a[0]]='';

abs[a[0]]=Number(abs[a[0]])-Number(a[2]);

}else abs[a[0]]-=Number(a[2]);

}

text=text.replace(/#전체변수[^#]+#/,'');

}else{text=text.replace(/#전체변수[^#]+#/,'(올바르지않은 태그사용법)');}

}

while(text.includes('#변수|')){

var a=text.split('#변수|')[1].split('#')[0];

if(a.includes('|')){a=a.split('|');}else a=[a];

if(a.length==1){

text=text.replace(/#변수[^#]+#/,(bs[room][a[0]]===undefined?'지정된값없음(0또는""상태)':bs[room][a[0]]));

}else if(a.length==2){

bs[room][a[0]]=Number(a[1]);

text=text.replace(/#변수[^#]+#/,'');

}else if(a.length==3){

if(a[1]=='더하기'){

if(bs[room][a[0]]===undefined)bs[room][a[0]]='';

bs[room][a[0]]=Number(bs[room][a[0]])+Number(a[2]);

}

if(a[1]=='빼기'){

if(isNaN(Number(a[2]))){

if(bs[room][a[0]]===undefined)bs[room][a[0]]='';

bs[room][a[0]]=Number(bs[room][a[0]])-Number(a[2]);

}else bs[room][a[0]]-=Number(a[2]);

}

text=text.replace(/#변수[^#]+#/,'');

}else{text=text.replace(/#변수[^#]+#/,'(올바르지않은 태그사용법)');}

}

while(text.includes('#랜덤')){

var say=text.split('#랜덤')[1].split('#')[0].split('|');

text=text.replace(/#랜덤[^#]+#/,say[Math.floor(Math.random()*say.length)]);

}

replier.reply(text);

}

}

if(msg=='!!학습목록'){

let list=[];

for(let i in StockMSG.learn[room]){

list.push(i+' | 작성자:'+StockMSG.learn[room][i].writer+'\n대답:'+StockMSG.learn[room][i].say+'\n\n');

}

replier.reply('《학습목록》'+u200d+'\n'+(list==0?'아무것도없어요.\n!!학습추가 대답할말::응답할말로\n추가해보세요.':list.join('')));

}

if(msg.startsWith('!!학습추가')){

try{

const mSg=msg.substr(6).trim().split('::');

if(!msg.includes('::'))throw new Error('No');

}catch(e){replier.reply('《!》[Error During Split]\n!!학습 학습할말::대답할말\n으로작성해주세요.');return;}

if(StockMSG.learn[room][mSg[0]]===undefined){

if(mSg[0].length<3){

replier.reply('글자수가너무적어요.\n최소글자수는 3글자에요.');return;

}else{

StockMSG.learn[room][mSg[0]]={'say':mSg[1],'writer':sender};

replier.reply('《!》추가되었어요!\n대답할말:'+mSg[0]+'\n응답할말:'+mSg[1]);

}

}else replier.reply('이미있는 학습언어에요!');

}

if(msg.startsWith('!!학습삭제')){

if(StockMSG.learn[room][msg.substr(6).trim()]!==undefined){

delete StockMSG.learn[room][msg.substr(6).trim()];

replier.reply('《!》삭제되었어요!\n'+msg.substr(6).trim());

}else replier.reply('그언어는 학습된바가없어요 :(');

}

if(msg=='!!학습초기화'&&sender=='관리자이름'){

//센스있게 프로필코드로 바꿀수있으리라 믿겠습니다(?)

delete StockMSG.learn[room];

Api.reload(scriptName);

replier.reply('초기화완료');

}

before[room]=msg;

}

​

function MSG(){

this.learn={

};

}

function onStartCompile(){

FS.write('sdcard/PROFILE/MSG/Data.json', JSON.stringify(StockMSG.learn));

}
article.subject: 가르치기에 변수를(?) 첨가해봤습니다

cafe.introduction: 자바스크립트를 사용하는 카카오톡 봇 관련 커뮤니티 입니다.
cafe.name: 카카오톡 봇 커뮤니티

items.content: 저번에 indexOf 쓰시더니 이번에는 startsWith 쓰시네요 !
